charinfo.name: ET Nidaime Mizukage (S)
charinfo.description: Edo Tensei Nidaime Mizukage (S) has been resurrected against his will to do battle.  He does not want to hurt anyone but he is interested in the potential of the new generation. He will test their limits with his own skill.

abilities.name: Steam Imp
abilities.description: Edo Tensei Nidaime Mizukage (S) uses Steam Imp on all enemies dealing 10 affliction damage. Edo Tensei Nidaime Mizukage (S) and his allies will ignore stun effects for 1 turn when this skill is used.

abilities.name: Major Summoning Giant Clam
abilities.description: Edo Tensei Nidaime Mizukage (S) summons a giant clam gaining 80 destructible damage for 3 turns. Hozuki Water Gun deals an additional 5 damage during this skill. This skill becomes Mirage Illusion for 5 turns when this skill is used.

abilities.name: Hozuki Water Gun
abilities.description: Edo Tensei Nidaime Mizukage (S) uses Hozuki Water Gun on one enemy dealing 20 piercing damage. If used on an enemy and that enemy drops to 15 or less health that enemy will be killed.

abilities.name: Genjutsu Defense
abilities.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Nidaime Mizukage (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.
